Title: Loss
Actors: Valda Bickute, Kostas Smoriginas, Dalia Micheleviciute, Andrius Mamontovas
Plot: Mentally ill young woman Valda convinces herself that a boy growing up in an orphanage is her child. Following the footsteps of a thousands Lithuanians, she immigrates to Ireland to earn money to save him. "Loss" portrays beauty and tragedy in the human heart.
